DOC.brief_summary: A randomized , open-label , multiple-dose , crossover study investigate pharmacokinetic drug interaction rosuvastatin telmisartan/amlodipine healthy male volunteer
DOC.brief_title: The Pharmacokinetic Drug Interaction Between Rosuvastatin Telmisartan/Amlodipine
DOC.detailed_description: A randomized , open-label , 2-treatment , 2-sequence , 2-period , multiple-dose , crossover design
DOC.criteria: 19~55 year healthy male Body weight 55kg , The result Body Mass Index ( BMI ) less 18 kg/m2 , 27 kg/m2 Subjects agree keep contraceptive method clinical trial . Subjects allergic investigational drug . Subjects medical history affect clinical trial . Hypertension ( Systolic BP ≥ 150mmHG Diastolic BP ≥ 100mmHg ) , Hypotension ( Systolic BP ≤ 100mmHg Diastolic BP ≤ 65mmHg ) Liver enzyme ( AST , ALT ) level exceeds maximum normal range one half time .
